hero.heading: Building Partnerships Building Dreams
hero.paragraph: We believe in collaborative design, working closely with clients to understand their vision and bring it to life. Our expertise in architectural design and project management ensures seamless execution from concept to completion.

about.aboutParagraph:
PT.SSI was established during a period of downturn in China's infrastructure and real estate sectors, while industrial parks and construction in Indonesia are thriving.
It integrates resources from a professional technical team from China and a consulting team from Indonesia, complementing each other's strengths.
The company aims to meet the needs of various foreign investors looking to establish factories in Indonesia by providing professional technical services, consulting services,
supervision services, and assistance with construction permit procedures that are tailored to Indonesia's national conditions.
The goal is to offer a range of specialized services to investors, addressing their concerns regarding design, consulting, supervision, and approval processes.

hero.heading: 建立合作伙伴关系，构建梦想
hero.paragraph: 我们相信协作设计，与客户紧密合作，理解他们的愿景并将其实现。我们在建筑设计和项目管理方面的专业知识确保从概念到完成的无缝执行。

about.aboutParagraph:
PT.SSI是在中国基建及地产行业低迷, 印尼产业园区及工业建设如火如荼之际, 由
中国专业技术团队,印尼顾问团队资源整合, 优势互补,为满足来印尼投资的各国资本方投资建厂需求，提供符合印尼国情的专业技术服务、咨询服务, 监理服务,建设
证件手续办理服务的印尼本土公司,旨在为投资方提供各类专业化服务,解决各投资
方在设计、咨询、监理、报批报建等方面的后顾之忧而成立的设计公司。
